name: National Board Of Review
title: National Board Of Review Awards
content: The National Board of Review Awards are given by the National Board of Review of Motion Pictures in recognition of excellence in filmmaking.

name: Oscars
title: Academy Awards (Oscars)
content: The Academy Awards, also known as the Oscars, are awards for artistic and technical merit in the film industry.

name: European Film Award
title: European Film Awards
content: The European Film Awards are presented annually by the European Film Academy to recognize excellence in European cinematic achievements.

name: Golden Globe
title: Golden Globe Awards
content: The Golden Globe Awards, known for recognizing excellence in film and television, both domestic and foreign.

name: César
title: César Awards
content: The César Awards are the national film awards of France, given out by the Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma.

name: Australian Academy Award
title: Australian Academy Awards
content: The Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts Awards are presented annually by the Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts (AACTA).

name: Golden Raspberry
title: Golden Raspberry Awards
content: The Golden Raspberry Awards, also known as the Razzies, are a satirical award ceremony recognizing the worst in film.
